A classic for its simplicity and thoughtful design.  Replaying made me miss physics-based games like Halo and Half Life.  Definitely worth the 2-3 hours to replay or experience if you never have before.  Ran into some minor hick-ups using a controller and had to reset the app, but otherwise it runs well on modern hardware.
ta wenardo me gusta jugarlo porque me hace sentir inteligente B)
Lots of fun.  Lots of frustrations.  More fun tho....

A classic Valve game. Short, atmospheric, and enjoyable.

This was a triumph
I'm making a note here; "Huge success"
It's hard to overstate
My satisfaction
Aperture Science:
We do what we must
Because we can
For the good of all of us
Except the ones who are dead
But there's no sense crying
Over every mistake
You just keep on trying
Till you run out of cake
And the science gets done
And you make a neat gun
For the people who are
Still alive
I'm not even angry
I'm being so sincere right now
Even though you broke my heart,
And killed me
And tore me to pieces
And threw every piece into a fire
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you
Now, these points of data
Make a beautiful line
And we're out of beta
We're releasing on time
So I'm GLaD I got burned
Think of all the things we learned-
For the people who are
Still alive
Go ahead and leave me
I think I'd prefer to stay inside
Maybe you'll find someone else
To help you?
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke *Haha - Fat Chance*
Anyway this cake is great
It's so delicious and moist
Look at me: still talking
When there's science to do
When I look out there,
It makes me GLaD I'm not you
I've experiments to run
There is research to be done
On the people who are
Still alive
And believe me I am
Still alive
I'm doing science and I'm
Still alive
I feel fantastic and I'm
Still alive
While you're dying I'll be
Still alive
And when you're dead I will be
Still alive
Still alive

     Portal is a experience you can't get anywhere else, the game-play is simple and fun with puzzles that will
test your mind to the limit. Sure it isn't the longest game in the world. But this was something fresh, something new that blew everyone away.
I've been falling infinitely for hours now. I can't stop. I have a family. Please help. 11/10
This game was a pioneer for puzzle games at the time of its release! Love this game!

Muito divertido e revolucionÃ¡rio para a Ã©poca do seu lanÃ§amento. Criativo, sarcÃ¡stico e atÃ© um tanto medonho em algumas partes. 

A ambientaÃ§Ã£o Ã© muito boa, assim como a gameplay Ã© muito divertida por se tratar de um puzzle muito inteligente e com fases muito bem desenvolvidas. Os diÃ¡logos da GLaDOS sÃ£o INCRÃVEIS. Certamente um jogo que deve ser jogado por qualquer um.
Are you allowed to not like this game? I mean... its Portal.

Playing this game after growing up feels quite different from 10~ years ago. I just love source engine games and Portal's setting is nostalgia inducing & unnerving. The sound design really adds to the entire atmosphere & levels are straightforward for the most part but get your brain going!

Bunny hopping and other movement tech in this game just feels so satisfying as nothing is out to kill you and you can really just jump around setting portals and flinging yourself everywhere. 

10/10 game
10/10 cake
Challenging mentally, very fun, and you get cake at the end.

It's a short game, sure, but it's great. Only took me about 2 and a half hours to beat the game, and now, at 5.7 hours total, I've also beaten all the advanced maps. It was very fun to play, and I'm glad this did well enough to get a second game.
